name: Winter Novel
description: Snow, dullness, depression. Constant dissatisfaction with work and superiors and feeling like there is no escape. Is this what life will always be? Perhapsâ€¦ but I can always hope for change to be just around the corner!
minimum_requirements: Memory: 40 MB RAM Storage: 4 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm really enjoyed the game. Thank you! The most unique thing is a graphics. But I've liked the story too.
